# seaice.map

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of seaice.map is to render a global map of sea ice. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of seaice.map from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mdsumner/seaice.map")
```

Everything here runs via targets. The artefacts are stored in on object storage at 

```
endpoint: https://projects.pawsey.org.au
bucket: nuyina.map
```

Uses path style endpoint/bucket/key. I.e. 

```
https://projects.pawsey.org.au/nuyina.map/NOAA/G02135/2025/concentration_v4.0_2025-11-10.tif
```

Index to come.
